options.label: Morning
options.value: Rise and shine! ☀️ Start your day with positivity and energy.

options.label: Lunchtime
options.value: Time to refuel! 🥗 Enjoy a satisfying meal to power through the rest of your day.

options.label: Afternoon Break
options.value: Take a breather! 🍵 Grab a cup of tea and recharge for the tasks ahead.

options.label: Evening
options.value: Unwind and relax! 🌌 Reflect on your day and do something you love.

options.label: Bedtime
options.value: Goodnight! 😴 Ensure a restful sleep for a fresh start tomorrow.
